titleStmt.title: The case and vindication of William Knight, late minister of Whitbey in the county of York Wherein are discovered the design, means, and instruments of his sequestration, which happened on the 28 of December 1652. at the Committee for Plundred Ministers, Mr. Gilbert Millington being in the chair.
titleStmt.author: Knight, William, minister of Whitby.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
